general.gigTitle: develop, fix, install any wordpress plugin, theme or website

sellerCard.description:
Hello, my name is Sebastian. 

I spend a lot of my time achieving my goals and improving myself. I am passionate about my activities and skills. I am specialized in Website designing & development, Laravel & WordPress, E-Commerce stores, as well as web scraping.

I have great experience & reputation on different freelance platforms with customization & optimization of themes/plugins, creating & longtime support themes/plugins, etc.

Here to provide you quality services on time with an affordable price. 

Consultation via chat is always FREE, so contact me to know how I can help you.

description.content:
Are you looking for a WordPress professional?

 

I will install and customize or write your WordPress theme/plugin from scratch. I have many years of experience with WordPress and its structure and will deliver high quality work.

 

 

My list of service are given below:

 

  • Install or migrate WordPress on your server.
  • Install any plugin/theme on your website.
  • Build any plugin/theme from scratch upon your requirements.
  • Demo content import.
  • Customize 100% until your satisfaction.
  • Build any type of website.
  • Redesign your website.
  • Fix theme CSS issues.
  • Integrate external API to your site.
  • Fix SSL problems.
  • Any kind of WordPress service.
  • Fix any WooCommerce issue on your WordPress website.
  • Speed/performance optimizations.

 


I will work using following technologies:


  • PHP
  • HTML, CSS, JS, jQuery, Bootstrap
  • MySQL database



Note: Please message me with your requirements before placing an order.

openGraph.title: develop, fix, install any wordpress plugin, theme or website

reviews.comment:
Sebastian is amazing! He built a custom WordPress plugin for me that works great despite it's complexity. What’s even better is they keep it updated and make sure it’s always running smoothly whenever something strange pop us.

Super easy to work with, great communication, and really know their stuff. If you need a reliable coder who goes above and beyond.
Gute Kommunikation und schnelle Lieferung. Sehr zu empfehlen.
Sebastian war eine Riesen Hilfe und hat sich sehr schnell in unsere tracking Probleme eingearbeitet.
Great to work with you again!
